subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lukas Podolski scored twice in the first half, and Arsenal defeated a third-tier team, Coventry, 4-0, to reach the Round of 16 of the F.A. Cup.
snippet: Lukas Podolski scored twice in the first half, and Arsenal defeated a third-tier team, Coventry, 4-0, to reach the Round of 16 of the F.A. Cup.
